definition: choy sum/Chinese flowering cabbage/stem of any Chinese cabbage
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: With heart of Romaine, Parmesan, Anchovy Dressing and Cajun dusted Prawn skewers.
sentences.chinese: 配羅馬菜心，帕馬森芝士粉，銀魚柳和蝦串。

sentences.english: The best cold storage temperature is about 1 ℃.
sentences.chinese: 莖用芥菜菜心的冷藏適宜溫度是1℃左右。

sentences.english: Minnan cabbage plumule's pickling methods and its soaking technique with soy sauce are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹閩南菜心的醃製和醬油漬加工技術。

sentences.english: She cut the lettuce in half and took away the heart.
sentences.chinese: 她將萵苣切成兩半，然後取走了菜心。

sentences.english: Baked Australian Beef Fillet, Tomato, Mushroom on Grilled Polenta with Green Vegetable.
sentences.chinese: 焗澳洲牛柳，番茄，蘑菇配以香煎玉米餅及菜心。

sentences.english: We'll take the Season Vegetable in Oyster Sauce, the string Beans and the Mushroom Soup.
sentences.chinese: 我們要蠔油菜心，乾煸四季豆和蘑菇湯。

sentences.english: Place rice in bowls, add hot broth and top with sliced duck breast and green vegetables to serve.
sentences.chinese: 碗內盛白飯，注入滾湯，排上鴨件及菜心即可品嚐。

definition: variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)
Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
